column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the procedure which can be for filtering, e.g. in the SOS.

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the procedure identifier, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the procedure.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the procedure name, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the procedure

column.name: is_deleted
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is deleted.

column.name: description_file
column.comment: Location to or XML encoded description of the procedure. Can be used if procedure history is not supported.

column.name: is_reference
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is a reference.

column.name: fk_type_of_procedure_id
column.comment: Reference to a procedure this entry is a typeOf.

column.name: is_aggregation
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is an aggregated process or a system.

column.name: is_mobile
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is mobile (1/true) or stationary (0/false).

column.name: is_insitu
column.comment: Flag that indicates if the procedure is insitu (1/true) or remote (0/false).

column.name: fk_format_id
column.comment: Reference to the format of the procedure description, e.g. SensorML 2.0
